title: Independent furnished Flat
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


2nd floor
Sunny, Studio with charm : ceiling with wooden beams 
Bathroom with washing machine
Close to Montmartre, subway station Place Clichy
2’ far from 2 underground lines, 6 buses lines, velib station
Biologic open market on Saturdays
880 euros per month, building charges included
Direct from owner
Deposit required
